query:
SELECT
                        -- Viewer in group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups
                            WHERE
                                user_id = $1 AND
                                group_id = $3
                        ) AND
                        -- Responsible in group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups
                            WHERE
                                user_id = $2 AND
                                group_id = $3
                        )
